OUTLINE : This randomize , open-label , multicenter study . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive low dose oral bexarotene daily week 1-26 . Patients also receive ultraviolet A light therapy oral methoxsalen 3 time weekly week 2-26 . - Arm II : Patients receive high dose oral bexarotene daily week 1-26 . Patients also receive ultraviolet A light therapy arm I . Patients follow 4 week . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 100 patient ( 50 per treatment arm ) accrue study .
